author: ghost
body:
I'm trying to get Linux to Windows SSHRemoting to work using this guide: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/demos/SSHRemoting. I'm stuck at this step (of course with the correct PowerShell path):

```Subsystem    powershell c:/program files/powershell/VERSION/powershell.exe -sshs -NoLogo -NoProfile```

If I run this command on the Windows 2012 R2 server, it says:

```Subsystem : The term 'Subsystem' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program.```

Am I missing something? Is this a PATH issue?

comments.author: ghost
comments.body: It was not clear to me that this step refers to the sshd configuration.

title: The term 'Subsystem' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program.
